mission.title: Gukorera mu
mission.description: Kuva 2006, Hopefund Burundi yavutse mu ciyumviro Gikristu: gutanga uburyo bwo kugira amafaranga afite agaciro ku Murundi wese, mu kwubahiriza ingingo z'ubutungane, ubumwe n'icyizere. Imyaka 20 mu murimo w'imiryango y'Abarundi.
mission.value1Desc: Imiyoborere yacu iyoborwa n'ubutungane, ukuri n'urukundo rw'abandi.
mission.value2Desc: Dushigikira amatsinda y'ubuzima (Ibimina) n'ubufasha bushingiye ku kwifashanya.
mission.value3Desc: Dufasha imishinga y'uburimyi, ubucuruzi n'imiryango kugira ingaruka zirambye.
mission.value4Desc: Inyuma y'amafaranga, dutanga ubufasha bw'umutima n'impwemu ku banyamuryango bacu.

howItWorks.title: Uba umunyamuryango mu
howItWorks.description: Kwinjira mu muryango wa Hopefund Burundi ni kworoshye kandi biratungana bose

howItWorks.step2Desc: Ishura amafaranga yo kwiyandikisha (ubuntu ku banyeshuri, 5,000 BIF ku bantu ku giti cabo) winjire mu muryango wa Hopefund Burundi.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Ushobora gukoresha serivisi zose: ubwizigame, ideni, mobile banking. Imana ihezagire imishinga yawe!

faq.title: Ibibazo
faq.description: Shaka ibisubizo ku bibazo byawe vuba
faq.q1: Ninjira nte mu muryango wa Hopefund Burundi?
faq.a1: Kugira ube umunyamuryango, ja mu masoko yacu hamwe n'indangamuntu y'u Burundi n'ifoto. Uzishura igice c'amafaranga gito cya 10,000 BIF. Ushobora no kwiyandikisha mbere kuri application yacu cyangwa ukoresha *847#.
faq.q2: Ni inyandiko izihe zisabwa ku ideni?
faq.a2: Ku gusaba ideni, uzokenera: indangamuntu yawe, icyemezo c'aho uba, kandi hakurikijwe ubwoko bw'ideni, umushinga cyangwa icyemezo cy'amafaranga winjiza. Ku matsinda y'Ibimina, garantie y'itsinda ishobora guhagije.
faq.q3: Hopefund Burundi ni ishirahamwe Gikristu koko?
faq.a3: Yego, Hopefund Burundi yashinzwe ku ngingo Gikristu zo kwifashanya n'ubumwe. Ingingo zacu z'ukuri, ubutungane n'urukundo rw'abandi ziyobora ibikorwa byacu byose. Twemerera bose, uko bazera kwose, kandi twubaha itandukaniro ry'abanyamuryango bacu.
faq.a4: Itsinda ry'Ibimina rihuza abantu 10-30 babika hamwe. Buri munyamuryango atanga intererano ku buryo busanzwe, kandi itsinda rishobora kubona ideni rizunguruka cyangwa ideni hamwe. Bishingiye ku kwizerana n'ubumwe. Hopefund Burundi ifasha amatsinda n'amahugurwa n'isuzuma ry'ubuziraherezo.
faq.q5: Nshobora gukoresha Hopefund Burundi nta smartphone mfise?
faq.a5: Cane! Serivisi yacu ya USSD (*847#) ikora kuri telefone zose, n'iz'ishaje. Ushobora kureba amafaranga yawe, kohereza no kwishura facture. Amasoko yacu na yo ariho kugira akakwakire.
